review.comment: For me dance has always been a family...for most of my life it was my actual family (sisters, cousin and niece all dance(d) too). Since then I've been lucky enough to find new dance families--first in Florida and then in GA. Now I've found my forever dance home. The community is maybe even the best part, but the caliber of classes offered in so many styles specifically for adults is refreshing. Motus truly supports every dancer at every level. There are classes for beginners to advanced/professionals and everything in between. You can't help but feel better after dance for an hour...or several.

Love this dance studio! I really love the vibe here.  I drive up to Alpharetta from the city to take class here when I can. It’s important to me to support talented instructors and a fantastic studio that fosters such a supportive dance community that also helps me grow as a dancer. Thanks MOTUS! You’re a real gem.
review.review_reply: Thanks, we are so glad you are part of our community.

review.comment: I love Motus and the environment and community the owners have created and continue to foster!  It is truly a safe place to learn and grow as a dancer (catering to all levels) and also offers yoga and other cross training and conditioning exercise classes to make for a well rounded studio experience.  With classes offered throughout the day (including evenings and Saturdays) it works with varying types of schedules.  I always feel welcome and comfortable to explore (even with new types of classes for me) and it’s a fun way to exercise.  Going to classes brightens up my week for sure!  And the teachers are top notch.  Love this studio!
review.review_reply: Thanks for your kind words, Melissa! We love dancing with you and appreciate your friendship and support! We do have an AWESOME community at Motus! And we love that you are part of it!

review.comment: Variety of classes. Excellent instructors. Extremely welcoming & friendly.
review.review_reply: Thank you Tye! We have the best members for sure! You are such a special part of Motus!

review.comment: Wonderful group of passionate professionals dedicated to helping clients learn and enjoy dance!
review.review_reply: Thanks Allison! We love watching our members grow in confidence and ability! You are a dedicated dancer, and it shows!!!
Thanks for the 5-star rating Paula! We love having you back at the studio!

review.comment: Love love love the time spent here! Such wonderful people leading who love what they do and do it with excellence. Motus creates a great environment to dance and enjoy the experience!
review.review_reply: Thanks Julie!   Our members help to create this wonderful community.

review.comment: I know the owners.  They love what they do and love to share with others.
